content: this shawl is a joyful piece to create made with medium-weight self-striping acrylic yarn this one-skein project works up quickly thanks to tall stitches that create a light fabric delicate lace details bloom with floral motifs adding charm and a hint of whimsy wrap yourself in a touch of romance with this airy lace shawl perfect for dreamy days and cozy evenings i used only one cake of tea time yarn by hobbii
